experience_section_paragraph_1: QuasarApp is a team of professionals passionate about creating high-quality mobile and desktop applications with open source code.
experience_section_paragraph_2: Since 2017, we have been crafting innovative solutions for Android and desktop platforms, including games.
experience_section_paragraph_3: We have amassed a vast library of over 60 ready-made software components, allowing us to create final products with incredible speed. Share your app idea with us, and we will bring it to life!
supported_platforms_section_list_1_descr: At QuasarApp, we leverage the power of Qt to build cross-platform mobile and desktop applications, streamlining development time and reducing costs. We offer support for our solutions on the following platforms:
supported_platforms_section_list_1_item_: Linux: A stable and reliable platform for server and desktop applications.
Windows: A popular platform for desktop applications with a wide audience.
Android: The leading platform for mobile devices with millions of users.
Web (Wasm): An emerging platform that allows you to run applications in a browser without sacrificing performance.
chat_bots_section_list_1_description: Additionally, we specialize in chatbot development:
chat_bots_section_list_1_item_1: Multi-channel chatbots: We can create chatbots that can interact with your customers through various channels, such as Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, Telegram, and more.
chat_bots_section_list_1_item_2: Intelligent chatbots: We utilize machine learning and artificial intelligence to build chatbots that can understand natural language and have meaningful conversations with your customers.
chat_bots_section_list_1_item_3: Customer support chatbots: We can create chatbots that can answer frequently asked questions, provide customer support, and resolve issues.
chat_bots_section_list_1_item_4: A chatbot for online ordering can become your indispensable assistant in the field of e-commerce
chat_bots_section_list_2_item_1: Enhance customer service: Chatbots can provide 24/7 support to your customers and answer their questions.
chat_bots_section_list_2_item_2: Boost sales: Chatbots can be used to qualify leads and schedule appointments.
chat_bots_section_list_2_item_3: Reduce costs: Chatbots can automate tasks typically performed by customer support representatives.
ordering_section_headline: Let's turn your app idea into reality!
ordering_section_paragraph_1: Do you have a groundbreaking concept for a mobile or desktop application? Share your vision with us!  Simply submit a project request on GitHub with a detailed description of your desired features and functionality.
ordering_section_list_1_item_1: Project scoping: Our specialists will review your request and provide an estimated timeline and resource allocation based on the project complexity.
ordering_section_list_1_item_2: Public projects: For public projects hosted on GitHub, the price may vary depending on community support.
ordering_section_list_1_item_3: Private projects: We offer private development options with clear, upfront pricing tailored to your specific needs.
ordering_section_list_2_item_1: Free consultation: Our experts will help you determine the scope of the project and make an approximate estimate.
ordering_section_list_2_item_2: Flexible payment solutions: We are ready to consider various payment options that are convenient for you.
ordering_section_paragraph_2: We look forward to working with you!
